long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Emoji Dropper: Merge and Eliminate Emojis in a Fun Puzzle Game!

Greetings, emoji enthusiasts and puzzle solvers! Prepare to embark on a delightful and engaging journey in Emoji Dropper, a game that combines the excitement of merging emojis with the challenge of strategic elimination. With gameplay reminiscent of the popular  Watermelon Dropper, you'll immerse yourself in a world of colorful emojis, clever combinations, and satisfying eliminations. Are you ready to merge, drop, and clear your way to victory in this captivating puzzle adventure?

âœ¨ðŸ’«âœ¨Game Features:

Merge and Combine Emojis: Merge identical emojis by strategically dropping them onto matching ones to create new and more powerful emojis. Experiment with different combinations, unleash special abilities, and watch as the emojis evolve and multiply on the game board.
Strategic Elimination: Plan your moves carefully to eliminate clusters of emojis and clear the board. Strategize your drops, create chain reactions, and strategically remove groups of emojis to earn points and progress through the levels.


Extension Button Menu 
*Play more games and explore exciting themes on the page menu buttons.
